resources.string:
Drizzle tap 
 

This game is an independent project made by two novice developers, and will most likely contain small bugs that will be patched in future updates.
 
 All fonts, visual effects, and sound effects used in this application are free-to-use products that are created to be used in a commercial context, and their respective creators will be listed below along with the name of their resource and a link to their work.
 

If you are experiencing any bugs or problems, feel free to contact us at kaggcontact@gmail.com, or by leaving a reply in the google play store.
 

Resources used in this game:
 

Sound effects:
 

Name: Blop Sound
 Creator: Mark Diangelo
 License: Attribution 3.0
 Link: http://soundbible.com/2067-Blop.html
 

Font:
 

Name: Some Time Later Font
 Creator: Infinite Type
 License: SIL Open Font License (OFL)
 Link: http://www.fontspace.com/infinite-type/some-time-later
